SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.qna_id, a.pin, a.category, a.job, a.reg_email, TO_CHAR(a.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt, a.depart, a.manager, a.manager_email, a.qna_sj, a.atch_file_id, a.status, a.answer_ty, TO_CHAR(a.answer_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as answer_dt, a.answer_id, a.del_yn
FROM CS_QNA a WHERE a.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND a.category = #searchType1#
AND a.job = #searchType2#
AND a.status = #searchType3#
and a.qna_sj LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY a.reg_dt DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pageIndex# AND (#pageIndex#-1) + #pageSize#

SELECT COUNT(a.qna_ID) FROM CS_QNA a WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND a.PIN = #pin#
AND a.category = #searchType1#
AND a.job = #searchType2#
AND a.status = #searchType3#
AND a.qna_sj LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY a.reg_dt DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.qna_id, a.pin, a.category, a.job, a.reg_email, TO_CHAR(a.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt, a.depart, a.manager, a.manager_email, a.qna_sj, a.qna_cn, a.atch_file_id, a.status, case when ANSWER_TY = 1 THEN '온라인 대응' when ANSWER_TY = 2 THEN '유선 대응' when ANSWER_TY = 3 THEN '원격지원' ELSE '' END answer_ty, a.answer_cn, TO_CHAR(a.answer_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as answer_dt, a.answer_id, a.del_yn, LEAD(a.qna_id, 1) OVER (ORDER BY a.reg_dt DESC) AS next_id, LAG(a.qna_id, 1) OVER (ORDER BY a.reg_dt DESC) AS pre_id FROM CS_QNA a WHERE a.DEL_YN = 'N' )A WHERE a.Qna_ID = #qnaId#
SELECT level2 CODE,level2 CODE_NAME FROM CS_CCODE WHERE LEVEL1 = #searchType1# GROUP BY level2 ORDER BY level2
SELECT level1 CODE,level1 CODE_NAME FROM CS_CCODE GROUP BY level1 ORDER BY level1
